zeroOffset.label: Zero Offset
zeroOffset.description: Indicates that the value accessor is called with a pointer to the struct and a 0 offset.
zeroOffset.brief: Indicates that the value accessor is called with a pointer to the struct and a 0 offset

valueAccessor.label: Value Accessor
valueAccessor.description: The name of the registered value accessor used to access this property.  The default is default.  See afw_runtime_value_accessor.h for the built in accessors.
valueAccessor.brief: The name of the registered value accessor used to access this property

memberName.label: Member Name
memberName.description: The member name of this property in the runtime struct if other than the property name.
memberName.brief: The member name of this property in the runtime struct if other than the property name

result.description: This is the object type of the runtime property of _AdaptiveValueMeta_.
